frame.name: Cause_proliferation_in_number
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> (or inanimate <fen>Cause</fen>) affects a <fen>Set</fen> so that the number of entities that make up the <fen>Set</fen> changes from an <fen>Initial_number</fen> to a <fen>Final_number</fen>. Alternatively, the situation can be described in terms of an <fen>Initial_state</fen> and a <fen>Final_state</fen>. In some cases the <fen>Attribute</fen> (i.e., number) or <fen>Difference</fen> in number may be mentioned.
<ex>More and more resources have been devoted to halting <fex name="Agent">rogue nation's</fex> <t>proliferation</t> <fex name="Set">of controlled nuclear technology</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The person who causes the <fen>Set</fen> to increase in number.</def-root>

FE.name: Difference
FE.definition: <def-root>The distance between the orginal value (<fen>Initial_number</fen>) and the final value (<fen>Final_number</fen>) of the <fen>Set</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The scale along which the <fen>Set</fen> ranges in, i.e., number.</def-root>

FE.name: Initial_number
FE.definition: <def-root>The initial number of entities in the <fen>Set</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Final_number
FE.definition: <def-root>The final number of entities in the <fen>Set</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Co-variable
FE.definition: <def-root>The Co-Variable is the scale that the amount of the <fen>Set</fen> is measured against.</def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition: <def-root>Any expression that says something about the movement of the entity (<fen>Set</fen>) along the scale between its <fen>Initial_number</fen> and its <fen>Final_number</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Speed
FE.definition: <def-root>The rate at which the entity's positon on the scale changes.</def-root>

FE.name: Set
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity whose amount is being changed.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that brings about the change in the number of the <fen>Set</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which the proliferating of the number of a <fen>Set</fen> is performed.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the <fen>Agent</fen> changing the number of the <fen>Set</fen> which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully). </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> changes the number of the <fen>Set</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Initial_state
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Set</fen> before it is affected by an outside <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Final_state
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Set</fen> after it is affected by an outside <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: proliferation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of increasing the number of something by an undiscolsed means.

lexUnit.name: multiplication.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of increasing the number of something.
